alert.note: Alert for Caddo; Comanche; Grady; Stephens (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 6:13PM CDT until August 12 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Comanche County in southwestern Oklahoma... Grady County in central Oklahoma... Southern Caddo County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Stephens County in southern Oklahoma... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 612 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles east of Rush Springs to 4 miles northeast of Lake Lawtonka, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lawton, Chickasha, Blanchard, Marlow, Cache, Elgin, Apache, Rush Springs, Bray, Fletcher, Cyril, Sterling, Alex, Cement, Medicine Park, Norge, Faxon, Bradley, Meers, and Boone. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
